Cryptography.name: No Think

Cryptography.description:
After breaking the pqrsen code, the box is unlocked. You open the box just to find an ancient machine. It can encrypt and hash something?

`nc slave3.ctf.arkavidia.id 10023`

*Author: haverzard*

attachment: https://drive.google.com/file/d/18JKH6iqmEaCNiecsGLpVSXoqkfkhhgi0/view?usp=sharing
Cryptography.name: cqler

Cryptography.description:
Last year, pqrsen wasn't solved using the intended solution because I forgot to patch & put constraints to my challenge when doing some changes. So I create a cryptosystem based on it.

Hopefully, it's working this time! And don't even try to bruteforce 15 alphanumeric & case-sensitive chars!

Unrelated:
![meme.png](/files/43d6c97e276ce8cd0d1f9fe3fac0a159/meme.png)

*Author: haverzard*

attachment: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1MofwjSaOSVaOrnsVAM9uiDlCKSSSbXxY/view?usp=sharing
Cryptography.name: qratz2048

Cryptography.description:
Ahh, we haven't seen you in a while, agent 007. We have some missions for you. We don't know whether each of them is related or not. Here, you can use this tool to communicate with us.

`nc slave3.ctf.arkavidia.id 10022`

*Author: nightmare*

attachment: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1YLQHV1fQWZ5nxABVvBd_7-D8KnhMebZm/view?usp=sharing
hints: What is the decrypt function for? Decryption, authentication, or something else?
Do you know that you can craft special encrypted data without decrypting the ciphertext?
Cryptography.name: re;union

Miscellaneous.description:
Melepas penat CTF dengan main game isekai dulu.

Flag dimasukkan ke dalam format `Arkav7{flag}`

*Author: girvinjunod*

attachment: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1r7E-p8vXuhdjwWA76CRFu3AfjU_YXQuh/view?usp=sharing
Miscellaneous.name: isekai

Miscellaneous.description:
Pada tanggal 9 Agustus 2019, sebuah artikel ilmiah dipublikasikan pada jurnal Computing and Software for Big Science. Salah satu penulis dari artikel ilmiah tersebut pernah menjadi narasumber pada suatu podcast. Sekitar tiga bulan setelah artikel tersebut dipublikasikan (1 Nov 2019), penulis ini mengunjungi suatu tempat di belahan bumi selatan. Cari tahu nama tempat tersebut.

Format flag: `Arkav7{nama_tempat_menggunakan_snake_case}`

*Author: didithilmy*
Miscellaneous.name: OSINT-1

Web.description:
Agar Arkavidia 7.0 bisa jadi 'impekful', kami mencoba membuat website LinkedOut untuk membantu kamu menjalin koneksi dengan orang lain. Riset internal LinkedOut menyatakan bahwa user paling aktif LinkedOut login setiap 5 menit sekali!

http://slave2.ctf.arkavidia.id:10014
